data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during DELPHINA cruise from Texel to Kaap de Goede Hoop started at 1821-04-20
Ship: Delphina, Voyage: Texel - Kaap De Goede Hoop, 1st Observer: J. Boelen (Kapitein), 2nd Observer: Alexander Delehaye
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
